channel.title: Opening shop
channel.description: I want to add a options dialogue so I added a dialogue to the npc but i dont how to make the shop opens when the option is clicked http://prntscr.com/3p1vyi

item.title: Opening shop
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In your dialoguehandler, under where you gave have the dialogue itself.
Add something like:

c.dialogueAction = 34857;

Then in your clicking buttons add this to each button for the interface (I don’t remember their ID’s you have to find them)

if(c.dialogueAction = 34587) { c.getPA().removeAllWindows();// to remove the dialogue c.dialogueAction = -1;// Resetting the id c.getShops().openShop(SHOP_ID_HERE);// Opening the shop itself }

Read full topic
